verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On May 8th] , [ARG0: US President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: an American withdrawal from the 2015 Iran nuclear deal] . Up until the last moment , European officials were urging the administration to change course .

On May 8th , US President Donald Trump announced an American withdrawal from the 2015 Iran nuclear deal . Up until the last moment , European officials [V: were] urging the administration to change course .

On May 8th , US President Donald Trump announced an American withdrawal from the 2015 Iran nuclear deal . Up until the last moment , European officials were urging [ARG0: the administration] to [V: change] [ARG1: course] .
